text: - Aseema and I'm back with a new lesson
on giving and receiving compliments well
we all like to give compliments and a
lot of us love to receive compliments
now giving and receiving compliments is
very important why because it
strengthens bones and improves
relationships but we need to be very
careful about certain points that are
you know come into play when we are
giving compliments and receiving them
when we are giving compliments the first
thing we need to make sure is that we
are sincere about it
so sincerity is the number one priority
you need to kind of keep in place when
you are giving a compliment
when you are sincere your compliment
will always be spontaneous it will be
full of enthusiasm and always positive
so when you are sincere you give
compliments as soon as you feel like
saying good things so basically the main
thing to remember is that you mustn't
really think in advance of what you're
going to say to make someone feel good
because then it sounds like fake because
a fake compliment is very easy to spot
and it's kind of embarrassing for the
giver and the receiver of the compliment
therefore you've got to be spontaneous
you've got to be enthusiastic and you've
got to be very positive with your words
while giving a compliment so if you see
someone singing very well instead of
saying you could beat Celine Dion you
could say you have a wonderful voice
that sounds more passe
if that sounds more sincere and it
definitely sounds more enthusiastic the
second point while giving compliments is
the need to be very specific what do I
mean by you know wanting to be specific
with my compliments it basically means
that I avoid any kind of generalization
for example maybe your mother cooks very
well she know she makes she bakes good
cakes she makes really good pasta you
know the whole deal and you really want
to compliment her for the cake she baked
yesterday if I say you are a good cook
mother
that sounds very general but if I want
to make my compliments sound more
effective then I might say mom you
really baked good cakes or you are one
of the best Baker I've ever known so
that sounds more specific because you
are actually complimenting her on the
particular thing that you are really
happy about and that's what being
specific while giving compliments really
means and then you've also got to be
very careful that you don't compare
achievements so when you are
complimenting somebody you don't say
that you did a good job considering that
your brother is a you know is a good you
know person too
you kind of only compliment someone
based on what dated based on their own
merit
so basically compliments should be based
on a single person's merit or merits so
suppose you know you have two siblings
and one of the siblings you know ran a
100-meter race and
came first so you don't say that you did
a good job but your brother also ran you
know the similar race last year and did
a good job too you don't want to do that
you don't want to compare at all when
you give a compliment
you give a compliment only to that
person and make that person feel very
special and that really works wonders as
far as being sincere is also concerned
the next one and probably the last a
point while you know giving compliments
is to be very timely timely means
nothing but giving compliments as soon
as the achievement is done so
complimenting immediately could be
exactly what I'm talking about
so if I you know have done something
that you like maybe I have made a cup of
coffee which you know you really liked
and you want to compliment me you don't
wait for a week to do that you do that
immediately if somebody has bought you
flowers and you're very happy with that
you don't wait for a day you do that
immediately being timely is as important
as being sincere while giving
compliments it works wonders in case you
don't have the opportunity to be timely
while giving a compliment you can always
send a thank-you card or a thank-you
note appreciating the fact that you have
lips that someone has done something for
you and you want to compliment them well
sometimes giving compliments sounds much
more easier than receiving them well a
lot of times it is very difficult for us
to receive compliments because we're not
custom to a lot of praise from people
but believe me receiving compliments can
also be a very easier job for you if you
bear in mind certain basic steps the
first thing that you will avoid while
receiving
compliments is the fact that you should
not shrug off or disagree with the
person who is complimenting you which
means that if someone tells you that you
look beautiful
don't shrug it off don't say that no
it's just the makeup or don't say that
you know this is maybe the dress I'm
wearing you can just say thank you
with a really big smile so the key is to
accept the compliment graciously and
don't disagree with the person so if the
person is saying that you are really a
good cook don't say that no I'm not a
really good cook but my mum's much
better well don't do that all you've got
to do say thank you with a big smile
again so the key is as I said be modest
accept the compliment graciously and
that's about it
the second one is don't upscale a
compliment what does it mean to upscale
upscale is nothing but increasing the
value for example suppose I did give a
presentation in front of the Board of
Directors today and a co-worker of mine
who also happened to be present at that
meeting happen to hear it and liked it
she would you know probably compliment
me by saying you did a good job with
your presentation but if I am trying to
be really smart
I might upscale or increase the value of
her compliment by saying good job know
I've done an excellent job so what am i
doing I'm actually being immodest and I
said that is very important to be modest
and accept the compliment graciously why
would I be immodest when someone
compliments me so therefore when someone
compliments you you don't increase the
value of the compliment but you be
modest and say thank you in other words
you're kind of
bring with the person and the person is
also not uncomfortable with your
increase in value of their complement
the next point is avoiding complimenting
back immediately
now guys just because you are being
complimented there is absolutely no need
for you to compliment that person back
in return so if you are wearing a really
nice coat or a really nice shirt and
someone tells you that's a wonderful
shirt you're wearing there is absolutely
no need to reply with a quick you're
wearing a good trouser as well there's
no need to do that because sometimes
when you compliment a person immediately
after they've complimented you it kind
of sounds insincere and almost like
you're trying to please them but we want
to be sincere and we want to be modest
and gracious so therefore again all we
will do is wear a big smile and say
thank you
well that's it from me on this lesson
